description: The table contains information sent to or returned from a prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMM_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Interface communication status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Successful


Communication timed out


Communication failed


License for interface not found


Required data missing


No service lines were sent out


Invalid diagnosis or procedure type

columns.name: GROUPER_RETURN_CODE
columns.description: The Grouper Return Code field from APC Grouper output fields.

columns.name: GROUPER_TYPE
columns.description: The Grouper Type field from APC Grouper output fields.

columns.name: GROUPER_VERSION
columns.description: The Grouper Version field from APC Grouper output fields.

columns.name: PAT_VISIT_TYPE
columns.description: The Patient or Visit Type field from APC Grouper output fields.

columns.name: APC_STATUS_CODE
columns.description: The ambulatory payment classification (APC) status code field from APC grouper output fields.

columns.name: PRICER_RETURN_CODE
columns.description: The Pricer Return Code field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: PRICER_TYPE
columns.description: The Pricer Type field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: BASE_APC_REIMB
columns.description: The Base APC Reimbursement field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: PAT_COPAY
columns.description: The Patient Co-payment field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: OUTLIER_PMT
columns.description: The Outlier Payment field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: PPS_CHRGS
columns.description: The PPS Charges field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: PPS_PMT
columns.description: The PPS Payment field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: TRANS_COR_HOLD_HARM
columns.description: The Transitional Corridor/Hold Harmless Add-on field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: CLM_DEDUCT
columns.description: The Claim Deductible field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: TOTAL_APC_REIMB
columns.description: The Total APC Reimbursement field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: OUTLIER_FLAG
columns.description: The Outlier Flag field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: BASE_RATE_FLAG
columns.description: The Base Rate Flag field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: COST_REDUCT_FACTOR
columns.description: The Cost Reduction Factor field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: RURAL
columns.description: The Rural field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: OUTPAT_RCC
columns.description: The outpatient ratio of cost to charge (RCC) field from APC pricer output fields.

columns.name: MARKUP_DISCNT_FACT
columns.description: The Mark-up/Discount Factor field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: PRICER_METHOD
columns.description: The Method field from APC Pricer output fields.

columns.name: ACE_RETURN_CODE
columns.description: The Ambulatory Code Editor (ACE) Return Code field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: ACE_VERSION
columns.description: The ACE Version field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: ACE_RLS_VERSION
columns.description: The ACE Release Version field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: NUM_CLM_ERRORS
columns.description: The Number of Claim Errors field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: NUM_DX_ERRORS
columns.description: The Number of Diagnosis Errors field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: NUM_PX_ERRORS
columns.description: The Number of Procedure Errors field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: NUM_CCI_ERRORS
columns.description: The Number of CCI Errors field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: NUM_ADMIT_DX_ERRORS
columns.description: The Number of Admit Diagnosis Errors field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: TOT_NUM_ERRORS
columns.description: The Total Number of Errors field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_DISP
columns.description: The Admit Diagnosis Disposition field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: OVERALL_CLM_DISP
columns.description: The Overall Claim Disposition field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: OCE_ERROR_DISP
columns.description: The OCE Error Disposition field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: CLM_ERROR_DETAIL
columns.description: The Claim Error Detail field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: RSN_VIS_DX_ERRORS
columns.description: The Reason for Visit Diagnosis Errors field from ACE output fields.

columns.name: ADJUD_TIME_DTTM
columns.description: The timestamp for each communication.

columns.name: OPTIMIZER_RET_VAL
columns.description: The Optimizer return value.

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_ADJU_YN
columns.description:
Indicate if the adjudication is the most recent adjudication that we get APC values.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OUT_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The admission from date of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_THRU_DATE
columns.description: The admission through date of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The patient birth date.

columns.name: OUT_PROV
columns.description: The provider of the claim. If your organization uses Tapestry's generic APC interface, this column saves the vendor identity ID of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_PAYOR
columns.description: The payor of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_AGE
columns.description: The patient age.

columns.name: OUT_SEX
columns.description: The patient sex.

columns.name: OUT_MRN
columns.description: The patient medical record number.

columns.name: OUT_PAT_CONTROL_NUM
columns.description: The patient control number.

columns.name: OUT_TOB
columns.description: The type of bill of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_DISCHRG_STAT
columns.description: The patient discharge status of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_TTL_CHRG
columns.description: The total charge of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_LEN_STAY
columns.description: The length of stay of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_ADMIT_SRC
columns.description: The source of admission listed on the claim.

columns.name: OUT_ADMSN_DX
columns.description: The admission diagnosis of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_ADMSN_TYPE
columns.description: The admission type of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_NPI
columns.description: The National Provider Identifier (NPI) of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_TAXONOMY
columns.description: The taxonomy of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_COND_CODES
columns.description: The condition codes of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_ACE_OVRIDE
columns.description: The ACE override ID of the claim.

columns.name: CCI_EDIT_SUM
columns.description: The Correct Coding Initiative (CCI) edit summary returned by the APC interface.

columns.name: OCE_EDIT_SUM
columns.description: The outpatient code editor (OCE) edit summary returned by the APC interface.

columns.name: TRACE_INFO
columns.description: The trace info of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_PAT_ID_NUM
columns.description: The patient identity ID of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_PROV_ID_NUM
columns.description: The provider identity ID of the claim.

columns.name: OUT_POS_ID_NUM
columns.description: The ID of the Place of Service (POS) on the claim.

columns.name: OUT_CLM_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The claim service date.

columns.name: OUT_AUTHCODE
columns.description: Authorization code

columns.name: OUT_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: Admission date.

columns.name: OUT_ESRD_ONSET_DATE
columns.description: End-stage Renal Disease (ESRD) onset date sent to the Prospective Payment System (PPS) pricer.

columns.name: ALTERNATE_HHRG
columns.description: Alternate home health resource group (HHRG) for home health agency (HHA) pricer.

columns.name: ALTERNATE_HHRG_FLAG
columns.description: Alternate HHRG flag.

columns.name: HOME_HEALTH_RES_GRP
columns.description: HHRG - Home Health Resource Group.

columns.name: NON_RESRC_SUPPLIES
columns.description: Non-resource supplies code.

columns.name: TREATMNT_AUTH_VALID
columns.description: Treatment authorization code validity flag.

columns.name: MAJOR_DIAG_CATEGORY
columns.description: Major Diagnostic Category.

columns.name: DRG
columns.description: Diagnostic Related Group (DRG).

columns.name: ALTERNATE_DRG
columns.description: Alternate diagnosis related group (DRG)

columns.name: RIC
columns.description: Rehabilitation Impairment Category.

columns.name: CLINICAL_CMG
columns.description: Original/Clinical Casemix Group.

columns.name: HIPPS
columns.description: Health Insurance Prospective Payment System (HIPPS) code

columns.name: COMORBIDITY_CODE
columns.description: Comorbidity code used for health insurance prospective payment system (HIPPS) assignment.

columns.name: ALTERNATE_PMT
columns.description: Alternate payment.

columns.name: ALT_ADDON_PMT
columns.description: Alternate add-on payment.

columns.name: COMORBIDITY_CAT
columns.description: Comorbidity category.

columns.name: QUALITY_FLAG
columns.description: Quality flag.

columns.name: ADJUSTED_BASE_RATE
columns.description: Adjusted base rate without patient-case mix adjustment.

columns.name: ADJUSTED_OUTL_MAP
columns.description: Outlier services Medicare anticipated payment used for cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: AVG_PERTREAT
columns.description: Actual amount of formerly separately payable services per dialysis treatment on monthly bill.

columns.name: AVG_PERTREAT_BLEND
columns.description: Predicted amount of separately payable services per dialysis treatment on monthly bill.

columns.name: DISPENSE_FEE
columns.description: Dispensing fee for oral-only drugs with an injectable equivalent.

columns.name: FIXED_LOSS_AMT
columns.description: Fixed dollar loss amount that is added to the predicted Medicare Allowable Payment to determine the cost outlier threshold.

columns.name: MONTHLY_SERV_AMT
columns.description: Total amount of formerly separately payable services utilized for the cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: AGE_FCTR_SEP_PYBL
columns.description: Separately payable portion of bundled age adjustment utilized for cost outlier calculation.

columns.name: BMI
columns.description: The Body Mass Index (BMI) of the patient.
